name: Putnam City School District I-001, Oklahoma County Reviews

review.title: “Great school to work for.”
review.pros: Pros – The pay is good, and the school really takes care of you.
review.cons: Cons – The students are difficult. I've taught at other schools and these are by far the worst.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Nothing. Keep up the good work.

review.title: “Long Hours, Great Vacation /Sick Leave, No Financial Incentives”
review.pros: Pros – All Federal Holidays off. 2wks paid vacation, 2 weeks sick leave, 3 Personal Days.
review.cons: Cons – Non experienced employees start at $26000, with 5 years experience start at $32000.Due to my circumstance coming in I was able to start higher, but I stayed at the same salary, despite a great peer review every year, and accolades for making impossible projectscome in on time, six years later.No cost of living increase, no OT, no Bonuses.No paid training given to new employees, no paid training given to long term employees.Many times I bought my own supplies and software to get my job done, as many timesI was told there was no money for it, even though it was beneficial to get the job done.
